thread.section_title: Trustpilot UK Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of uk.trustpilot.com
thread.title: Dagmar Wright
thread.title_full: Trustpilot UK reviewed by Dagmar Wright

author: Dagmar Wright
title: Dagmar Wright
text: Awful. I made some purchases from a company called Greenhouse Sensations, and was asked to provide feedback - which I did. Trustpilot then decided that for some reason they didn't believe my reviews were genuine, despite having been requested by the seller. I wouldn't be surprised if this was some underhand tactic to create biased review scores. I have lost all faith in the integrity of the information stored on Trustpilot as a result of this.
